content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Risk management is a responsibility of every individual and every member of staff should understand and follow corporate policies and best practices of EPAM and Refinitiv.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Operational risks are all around us as a result of our business activities or internal processes, conduct and systems.  We must \\\"see, say and fix\\\" the ones that may have a significant impact. That is why, it is extremely important that you follow the best practice of: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"“When in doubt, reach out to Compliance Team/EPAM Manager”\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have questions about compliance, see inappropriate behavior, want to get advice on a particular compliance area, or simply seek guidance on compliance-related issues, please do contact EPAM Compliance team at \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto: Shared_REFI_Global_Compliance@epam.com \"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Shared_REFI_Global_Compliance@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and/or EPAM Manager.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are here to help you to assess and address the risk/concern you may have. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
